title: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person buying a piece of land in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for a dead person to buy a plot of land in a dream. Some people want to know the dream interpretation for a dead person to buy a plot of land in a dream. Al-Alamin.Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person buying a piece of land in a dream. Seeing a deceased person buying an old house in a dream may indicate the high prices that the people of the house suffered at that time and they must seek help from God. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased was buying a very bad piece of land may indicate To financial obstacles that the dreamer may face during this time, and God knows best. Dreaming of a dead person buying a piece of land in a dream may indicate a person’s need to get closer to God Almighty during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person buying furniture in a dream in a certain situation. If one sees that the deceased was buying furniture for the house, this may indicate positive changes occurring to the dreamer to a large extent during this period. When you see the deceased buying furniture in the neighborhood in a dream, this may indicate good changes occurring to the dreamer during this period, thanks to God. Who Dreaming of a dead person who was buying furniture for the house in a dream, may indicate great livelihood and good events that will happen to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Seeing the deceased buying furniture for his house in a dream may indicate changes that will happen to the people of the house or joys that will come to them, thanks to God. Interpretation Dreaming of a dead person buying vegetables in a dream. In the event that you see a dead person buying vegetables in a dream, this may indicate the great choices that come to the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. When you see the dead buying vegetables for the living in your dream, this may indicate the abundance of a good and broad diet that You will get it during this time, and God knows best. Whoever dreams that the deceased was buying vegetables for the neighborhood may indicate future joys for the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. In the event that he sees the deceased buying vegetables, this could indicate the end of the debts and financial crises that the dreamer faced in the period Previous Praise be to God. Interpretation of dreams for a dead person to buy fish in a dream. If one sees that a deceased person was buying a fish in a dream, this may indicate the end of worries and sorrow from the dreamer’s life during this period, thanks to God. Whoever sees in a dream that a dead person was buying a fish, can It indicates rejection of the intense sadness that the dreamer was suffering from at that time, and God knows best. Dreaming of the deceased buying fish in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. And in the event that one sees that the deceased was buying fish and offering fish Fried, this may indicate that he heard happy news during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying medicine in a dream. If a person sees a deceased person buying medicine in a dream, this may indicate his faults that were present in his life, and God knows best. If a person sees that The dead person was buying medicine, so this may indicate that he asked for prayers for him from his household at that time. Seeing the dead person buying medicine in a dream may mean that the dead person needed

title: Interpretation of seeing lions in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you the interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream according to what was interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin. Such as cases of death, and when people see it in a dream, they feel confused, anxious and terrified by this vision, and jurists and scholars provide many clues that explain seeing it in a dream, and for this we will explain to you through lines from the following encyclopedia, the most important of which is that scholars presented the interpretation of dreams in interpreting this vision for a single girl and a woman. Married and pregnant woman. The color black in a dream. Interpretation of the color black in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that if a person does not like the color black and sees in a dream that he is wearing it, then this is a sign of sad events and unpleasant news that he will hear. But if the dreamer likes the color Black and saw in a dream that he is wearing it, then this is good news about happy events, because this vision has good connotations. Seeing black animals in a dream is an unpleasant dream and warns the dreamer of the harm that will befall him from an evil and cunning person. The color black in a single woman’s dream, dream interpretation scholars see If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a black dress and attending a wedding, this is an unpleasant vision and indicates sad events and the emergence of problems in her life. Also, seeing an unmarried girl in a dream wearing black and it increases her beauty and brilliance, is a sign that this girl She has a strong personality. Dream interpreters also said that the color black in an unmarried girl’s dream does not symbolize engagement or marriage, but rather indicates academic excellence, gaining a high status among people, or promotion in a job. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the home furniture turns into Black color, then this is a sign that she will travel to another country to work and earn a lot of money from this work. Black color in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that all her clothes and possessions are starting to turn black, this means that she is very worried, and is dominated by feelings Fear for the future, and she is very worried about her children. Also, a married woman who sees black in her dream indicates that she needs money to buy the necessities and household basics that she lacks. If a married woman dreams that she is wearing an attractive black dress and in this dress she looks charming and attractive, then this Good news for her that her relationship with her husband will improve, and God will give her stability and a life free of trouble, and that her husband will take care of her. Black curtains in a married woman’s dream indicate problems and fears that the dreamer will face, and this vision also indicates difficult events that will occur in her life, but God God Almighty will help her during this period. The color black in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a black pregnant woman in a dream indicates that she is worried about her birth and also shows fear for her fetus. Black furniture in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the financial crises that this woman is going through. This vision also shows The dreamer is going through a period

title: Death in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Since seeing death in a dream is one of the dreams that raise anxiety and terror in the heart of the dreamer, therefore in the following lines from gptafser.com/ we present to you the interpretation of the dream of death by Ibn Sirin, so follow us. Interpretation of the scene of death by Ibn Sirin in a dream for a single girl. Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of a dream Death for a single girl has connotations and meanings that differ from others because the dream is interpreted through social factors and the effects of the dream. Among Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of a dream about death for a woman are the following: If an unmarried girl sees death in a dream, this means that her marriage will end soon. If an unmarried girl sees her being buried in a dream, this means that she will actually get married, and God knows best. The dream of an unmarried girl indicates To the death of someone close to her and that she will get married soon. If an unmarried girl sees her father dying in a dream, this is a sign that her father will prolong his life. But if an unmarried girl sees that she died and drowned in the dream, this indicates that she is a good, pious girl. When a girl sees If an unmarried woman dies only in a dream, then this dream indicates happy news about her life. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that her lover is dying, this indicates that the time of their meeting is approaching. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream means the death of her former lover, it means that she Erase him from her thoughts forever. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is holding a dedication ceremony for the deceased. This is considered evidence of urging this girl to follow the rules of religion and good morals and abandon bad qualities. If an unmarried girl sees herself washing the deceased in a dream, this indicates her morals. Praiseworthy. It also indicates that she is a righteous daughter to her parents and has a close, intimate relationship with her Lord. An unmarried girl’s dream in a dream means that she is working to wash the dead. This indicates that she is a righteous person and works in her life to please God. If a girl sees a shroud in a dream, this means that She has a big, merciful heart and knows God in her dealings. The interpretation of an unmarried girl seeing in a dream that she is washing the dead person has a warning meaning about the necessity of returning to God. Also, this vision suggests getting rid of bad company and returning to the right path. See also: Interpretation of death in a dream For a close person: Interpretation of the death of Ibn Sirin in a dream for a married woman. There are some well-known interpretations of the sign Ibn Sirin in a dream about death for a married woman. We present them below: If a married woman sees the death of one of her family members in a dream, this indicates that she will obtain enormous wealth. This vision also indicates for a married woman It indicates that she will enjoy peace and tranquility in her family life. If a married woman sees her husband dying in a dream, this is a happy dream. An indication that this husband will achieve his dreams and find a good job opportunity abroad. If a married woman sees that her husband is dying in a dream and does not see any trace of sadness At home. This vision indicates that the dreamer will become pregnant soon. If a married woman dreams that she is covering her husband in preparation for burial. This is evidence that she is a pious wife and a woman who fears

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is frying eggs. This dream indicates that this girl will soon get engaged and that the person who proposed to her is familiar with her. This dream also indicates the joy and extroversion that will fill the wife’s life, her husband’s love for her, and understanding between them. When An unmarried girl dreams that she is frying eggs and eating them. She enjoys eating them. This dream indicates that this girl will find a new job. She will be respected, appreciated and loved at work. While if an unmarried girl dreams of frying eggs, that girl will also eat without peeling them. This The vision shows many worries, sorrows and problems that this girl will face in her life and she was not able to get rid of these problems easily. When an unmarried girl sees fried eggs in her dream and these eggs were unclean. This dream shows that this girl is immoral and unpopular among people. She does not like good to people. If an unmarried girl dreams of frying eggs, then this girl also eats them alive and puts spices on them. This dream indicates that this girl has a good reputation, a good personality, and performs her duties to the fullest. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees in her dream She is frying eggs and the eggs are rotten. This dream indicates many fears and situations that affect her life. But she will get rid of all the problems and traps that disturb her life in the coming period. See also: Rotten eggs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing fried eggs in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in Her dream is that she is frying her eggs and they taste good, and she is putting in different herbs. This dream indicates that this woman is happy in her life with her husband and is loyal to him. She also performs all the responsibilities of her house and her husband’s love for her and there is understanding between them. Whereas when she sees a married woman in her dream, she is frying and eating them. This dream indicates that this woman will achieve all the goals that she was striving for. Joy, happiness and kindness will come to her in the coming days. If a married woman sees in her dream that she said eggs, and ate, and these eggs were not peeled. This indicates a lot of problems and sadness. In her life between her and her husband, and the differences between them, and it is possible that things may lead to divorce between them. When a married woman sees fried eggs in her dream, these eggs were also unclean. This indicates that this woman did not raise her children well and that she does not respect and love her husband. If a married woman sees in her dream that there are fried eggs with meat next to them, then she eats. This indicates that this woman will obtain a new job opportunity that can be renewed and will last for long periods. When a married woman dreams that she is frying eggs and eating vegetables with them, this vision shows that this woman is raising her children in a way Moral. And to be a good woman who fears God, is devoted to prayer, and is devoted to her husband. Interpretation of seeing fried eggs in a dream about a man and its meaning. If one sees in his dream that he is frying eggs. This dream indicates that this man will achieve everything he dreams of, but the matter

title: Seeing a yellow snake in a dream

preview.html: What is the opinion of the highest interpreters of this vision, is it a praiseworthy or hateful vision? This is what we will learn in this article presented by our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream for one girl. When an unmarried girl sees a yellow snake in her dream. It is evidence of her failure in the field of study or work, and God knows best. It also means that she will fall ill in the coming period. And God is Greatest and Most Knowing. A yellow snake in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates her relationship with a treacherous and cunning person. A yellow snake could be the loss of some things and opportunities in reality. Seeing a snake in a dream and not being afraid of it is good news for living in peace and psychological comfort. Seeing a snake in a dream Water in a dream for an unmarried girl. It indicates an abundance of goodness, abundant food, and blessing, God willing. Her vision of a yellow snake biting each other in a dream and engaging in it was an unfavorable vision. It invalidates her engagement, because she is a disrespectful and cunning person. See also: A snake bite on His hand in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream for a married woman. The yellow snake in a married woman’s dream means marital strife and problems. As for seeing a long yellow snake in a dream, he commits a sin that will anger God. And she makes mistakes in her life that he will regret, and God knows best. The married woman who kills a yellow snake in her dream It means that she will get rid of an enemy. They will achieve all their desires, and even their exploits. The yellow snake killed her, which means getting her money back from a sworn enemy who hates her, and God knows best. The yellow snake in a married woman’s dream may indicate her separation from her husband, or her inability to take care of her children and her neglect towards them. A married woman who sees a very long snake in her bed is an unfavorable vision. Because it indicates toil and exhaustion due to her husband’s financial crisis. Some scholars also interpreted her vision of a snake in her bed as the end of worries and sorrows. Interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream for a man and its meaning. If one sees in his dream that He kills a yellow snake, so he will get a lot of good things without bothering himself. It also indicates that he will get rid of an evil that would have already happened to him. Killing a snake in general is the end of worries, sorrows and judgments, God willing. And if the man works, this is good news for obtaining a high and prestigious position. If he is afflicted with an illness or disease, he will be cured, God willing. A yellow snake that bites a man is evidence that there are people surrounding him. Or he is accompanied by friends who invite him to immorality, and God knows best. One of the most promising visions in a man’s dream is seeing a snake in the water. Because it indicates goodness and happiness in the days. Coming, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing a yellow snake in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A pregnant woman sees a yellow snake meaning an enemy that hates her, and God knows best. Or she will go through a period of exhaustion due to her pregnancy. A yellow snake in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a child, with permission. God. Seeing a yellow snake in her bed will go away the pain of pregnancy, God willing. If she sees a long yellow snake, she will give birth to an evil child, and God knows best. An auspicious vision is seeing it as a very long snake.

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a married sister in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a quarrel with a younger sister? It means reconciliation if you are really quarreling. The meaning of seeing a pregnant sister in a woman? A sure sign of the good that awaits your sister. What is the interpretation of a sister who sees her sister married while she is single? Evidence that he will get married soon. The meaning of seeing a married sister And her sister is a virgin? This means that he will get married early. What is the interpretation of seeing a beautiful sister? This vision is considered praiseworthy and good. Interpretation of a dream about a sister: A dream about a sister means happy news that will happen to you and change your life. If the sister in a dream for a married woman has good looks and appearance, This vision is considered praiseworthy and worthy of praise. A man who dreams that he sees his sister considers this food and happiness, and perhaps even marriage if he is single. A dream about a sister is for a married man and his sister was a virgin who did not marry, and this means that she will get married soon. Seeing a dream about a sister’s weddingInterpretation of a dream about a sister Marriage has different situations, for example, if this sister is already married, then the dream here means relief from anxiety. And if she has problems with her husband, then she will be released, especially if the owner of this vision is her sister’s brother. While you dream that you see your unmarried sister as if she is going to get married and she did not You see a concert of your husband’s musical instruments and such, then this means your sister’s wedding. While the dream is interpreted on the contrary, if the owner of this dream is a girl, if the sister sees that her sister is getting married, the owner of this dream is a virgin, divorced, or widow and will get married soon. Seeing a dream about a pregnant sister is considered a strange interpretation, especially if The sister here was single or had never been married. It is said that the dream of an unmarried sister is that she is pregnant or giving birth to a son, which means that she is carrying a lot of worries, but she is hiding them. Or that there are some problems that threaten her life and these problems will affect her negatively, and you must intervene and ask about your sister’s position. She is trying to find out what is worrying her and what is causing her anxiety. While the interpretation of the dream is that the sister is pregnant with a woman, this is sure evidence of the good that awaits your sister, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of hitting the sister. The interpretation of seeing a sister hitting an unmarried person means that you will get a living or an interest derived from that sister. Fighting With the younger sister means reconciliation, if you are fighting. Choking loudly with the sister, indicates the true feelings repressed towards your sister. Interpretation of the dream of the sister laughing, means the disease that afflicts her, and this disease is usually in her stomach. The dream of hitting the sister and making her cry is good and can That means removing fatigue and anxiety and restoring her good psychological state. A dream about a younger sister A dream about a younger sister means comfort and urgent care soon. A dream about an older sister also means good, but it is delayed and can come after a whole year. The death of your younger sister means travel, estrangement, and saying goodbye to your parents. If you see your sister in If you dream that she is sick, this may mean that you will get into trouble, but you will survive it. Some commentators have said that the death of the sister is a reference to the marriage of unmarried people, so death changes the situation, and God knows best. Joy in the dream. See grilled fish. Shrimps in the dream. Lentils in

title: Interpretation of a dream about a pulpit or pulpit in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the pulpit and the pulpit in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, climbing the pulpit, sitting in the mosque, reading poetry or the Qur’an from the pulpits of Ibn Sirin, and most of the pulpit in a dream. One of the most beautiful dreams that brings us goodness and happiness in our dreams, and which we still see in dreams, due to the frequent sighting of the pulpit in public life, in mosques. General life, and we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing the pulpit in a dream according to the translator Ibn Sirin, as he explained it in his interpretations. Seeing the pulpit in a dream is always a sign of goodness, and interpretation scholars say that seeing the pulpit in a dream indicates that the dreamer loves good deeds, and is getting close to God Almighty, And he approaches good deeds. Interpretation of the pulpit in a dream: The pulpit is performed by the Sultan, the king, the ruler, the imam, and the scholar. Whoever dreams that he speaks on the pulpit in something that is not appropriate, then he is famous for calamity and disobedience, and if he says what is appropriate, then it is good and blessed. Whoever dreams that he is on the pulpit receives knowledge or sermons for him. A high position and honor, and if he sees that he has fallen from it, the opposite will happen to him. Perhaps he will be crucified, and if the Sultan sees that he has fallen on the pulpit, or the pulpit breaks under him, then this indicates understanding, a high position, and status with the Sultan, and the fall of money and grace from his place, either through death or With others. They said that whoever saw him on the pulpit, if he knew, he would be promoted to his rank, and if he was ignorant, he would be caught stealing and crucified. If you dream of seeing a pulpit, this portends anger and sadness. If you see yourself on the pulpit in a dream, you will get sick and bad luck will accompany you in your trade or work. Interpretation of the pulpit in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the pulpit in a dream and speaking to it with words of kindness and justice is evidence that he will gain status and authority in life. Seeing the pulpit without speaking in a dream means that he will suffer From problems in his life. As for seeing a broken or cracked pulpit in a dream, this means that the queen will die or he will face some difficult problems. If the dreamer sees that he is preaching during the period of Hajj, and is not one of the missionaries in the dream, then this is evidence of his affliction with affliction and trouble. And delivering the sermon from On the pulpit he won the admiration of the listeners in the dream, evidence that he will become a saint and become righteous. Seeing a non-Muslim person preaching on the pulpit in a dream indicates the dreamer’s death in the near future. If you see a woman being addressed and remembered in a dream, this is evidence that she will suffer from scandals in life. And she suffers from difficult problems. Seeing the dreamer preaching on the pulpit in a dream, while he is not qualified to deliver the sermon, is evidence that he will be crucified. Forcibly removing the dreamer from the pulpit in a dream is evidence of the death of his authority and his death in the near future. Seeing the Sultan ascending the pulpit in a dream is evidence On the permanence of his rule in the near future and the enslavement of his performance. Seeing a pulpit in a dream also indicates the greatness that the dreamer enjoys. The dreamer spoke on the pulpit with knowledge, wisdom, and preaching in a correct manner, evidence that he will have a lot of goodness. Speaking in a dream is not worthy of the pulpit is evidence of He is a person known for his sins and will get into trouble. Anx

title: Interpretation of a dream about a flying cockroach in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing flying cockroaches in a dream is considered one of the disgusting insects that disgusts many people, and seeing a flying cockroach causes fear and panic among many people, especially girls and women, especially if they see a killed cockroach or a cockroach flying inside it. The room or in the house, and a flying cockroach is seen in a dream by a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man. Of course, there are many interpretations and meanings that we know in our discussion of the opinion of the scholar Ibn Sirin through this article. Interpretation of a flying cockroach in a dream. According to the opinion of the scholar Ibn Sirin, seeing a cockroach flying in A dream is a praiseworthy vision, even if in reality it is a disgusting insect, so the cockroach symbolizes longevity. A flying cockroach in a dream also shows the solidity and sturdiness of things and the extent of the dreamer’s insistence and perseverance on things and in achieving goals. A flying cockroach in a dream is evidence of negative influences in life. The fortune teller. Seeing a flying cockroach in a dream and trying to kill it indicates the dreamer’s attempt to get rid of the enemies that surround him in his life. Also, seeing killing a flying cockroach in a dream means the dreamer’s ability to overcome some of the bad habits he practices in his life. If one sees a cockroach in a dream If he flies after him, this means that there is an enemy following him and seeking to plot conspiracies and cause great trouble, which he is trying to do to him. As for seeing a person or a fortuneteller holding a cockroach and taking care of it, this indicates that he is unpopular and is trying to maintain it, or that he is practicing an undesirable bad habit. Also, seeing a flying cockroach chasing and disappearing among things in a dream means that the dreamer is looking for excitement and suspense in his life. Seeing a cockroach crawling in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need to reevaluate many situations in his life. Seeing a cockroach crawling into the kitchen in the dining room indicates the need to That the dreamer takes care of feeding himself and his family. As for a cockroach crawling into the living room or bedroom, this means the need to improve the viewer’s personal relationship, especially with his wife and family. If a person sees that he kills a cockroach in a dream and it dies in reality, this indicates his ability to get rid of it. The worst habits he does. Seeing a cockroach bite in a dream means that the dreamer has some traits that must be eliminated quickly. As for seeing two cockroaches fighting in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer is going through a stage of internal and external psychological conflict at the same time. Seeing a dead cockroach in a dream is evidence However, the viewer does not enjoy a stable or calm life in reality, and it is evidence of the disturbances that disturb life and he cannot get rid of them, so the subconscious mind depicts it in the form of a cockroach. Seeing a white cockroach in a dream is evidence of the presence of a person close to the fortuneteller, but he will lose trust in him. As for seeing A red cockroach indicates that happy events will occur during the coming period of the dreamer’s life. But seeing a black cockroach is evidence that there are many family problems on the way to the dreamer and that he will face many problems in his life.

title: Interpretation of seeing large bunches being watered in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing watering large grapes in a dream: The dream of watering grapes is one of the beautiful dreams that does not cause any kind of distress to the pioneer and makes him feel that there are positive things that will happen in the future. Dreams indicate goodness and abundance, and that what the dreamer offers at this time in his life will reap rewards in the coming days if he continues to give. In general, there are no disturbing interpretations of this dream. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing yourself watering large bunches of grapes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing grapes in a dream When the dreamer sees grapes in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will obtain a good and ample livelihood in the coming period of his life. When the dreamer sees grapes in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will gain goodness in his life and it will come to him before his time and before his time. When the dreamer sees grapes in a dream and picks a whole bunch of grapes, this means that the dreamer will get some money from a woman . Also, when the dreamer sees a lump in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will win a thousand dirhams from an unexpected place. Interpretation of the dream of seeing picking grapes in a dream: When you see the dreamer picking grapes in a dream and then throwing them away, this indicates that the dreamer will quarrel between him and his wife. Likewise, when the dreamer sees that he is eating grapes in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is drinking alcohol and vice versa. • When the dreamer sees many bunches of grapes in a dream hanging from their leaves, this means that the dreamer will be in a prominent and prominent position in his next life. Also, when the dreamer sees himself riding a horse, walking among grapes, and eating them in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will find a comfortable job. • When the dreamer sees a grape tree in a dream, this means that the dreamer will meet a non-Arab person who will give benefit to the dreamer. When the dreamer sees grapes in a dream, this means that the dreamer will find out his affairs easily and will achieve goodness and success in his next life. Interpretation of the dream of seeing black grapes in a dream When the dreamer sees black grapes in a dream and that he eats those black grapes and they are in season, this indicates That the dreamer will be sad, but this will be easy anxiety. As for the dreamer who sees black grapes in a dream and it was not on time, this indicates that the dreamer will meet them, or sadness, fear, or illness. • When the dreamer sees religious grapes in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will get money, but he gets it. With effort and exhaustion. When the dreamer sees red grapes in a dream, this means that the dreamer will receive a benefit, but it is a small benefit. Interpretation of a dream about seeing grape juice in a dream When the dreamer sees himself pressing grapes in a dream using a wooden press, this means that the dreamer will serve a king Unjust. But when the dreamer sees that he is pressing grapes in a dream with milk juice and clay, this indicates that the dreamer is serving the debtor’s property and is righteous.• When the dreamer sees that he is delaying pressing grapes in a dream in
